no-restricted-syntax.message: Use specific columns instead of SELECT *. This improves performance and reduces payload size by ~60%. Example: .select('id, name, status') instead of .select('*')
Avoid 'as any' on Supabase query results. Use proper types from supabase/types.ts or typed helpers from @/lib/supabase/typed-helpers. Example: Use Tables<'table_name'> or typedSelect() helper
